quirks.description: Can leave the mission at low health
Talks about preferring to fight alone
Doesn't have any quirks
Reward tax is higher than usual, allowing the Lich to steal more rewards
Stays on the ground level of the map. Avoids going up stairs and catwalks
Is afraid of Feral Kubrows and Drahks
Can leave the mission unexpectedly
Talks about hating Grineer when spawned on Grineer tilesets
Is afraid of fighting without backup
The lich will retreat after kneeling down and without stabbing
Talks about hating Infested when spawned on Infested tilesets
Talks when the player is on fire
Makes comments when the player turns invisible
Is afraid of the player's Operator
Talks about getting a snack after appearing on a mission
Talks about being allergic to nature
Talks about how beautiful they are after appearing on a mission
Upon spawning on a ship, sometimes stands frightened and does not attack first
Attacks allied Grineer troops; prevents the conversion of nearby Grineer into thralls
Makes aggressive comments if the player's Operator appears.
